trans-unit.target: TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_SEQ_00<tab>O'kalkaya has advice for any adventurers headed to the Missing Member.

TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_SEQ_01<tab>O'kalkaya warns you that Captain Rhoswen, leader of the Sanguine Sirens and proprietress of the Missing Member, is in no mood to entertain customers. If you insist upon visiting, O'kalkaya strongly suggests that you first pay your respects and /kneel to the captain.

TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_SEQ_02<tab>Rhoswen explains that the Sanguine Sirens are struggling to capture imperial vessels because their rivals, the Kraken's Arms, are seizing them first. Show Captain Rhoswen that you are /disappointed with this turn of events.

TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_SEQ_03<tab>Brushing aside your gesture of sympathy, Rhoswen muses on how she might motivate her crew to redouble their efforts. Demonstrate to her how you would /rally their spirits.

TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_SEQ_04<tab>Though your gesturing nearly earns you a gruesome death, you unintentionally inspire Rhoswen to embrace her piratical proclivities and steal better ships so that the Sirens can plunder Garlean outposts. Let O'kalkaya know that her captain is in higher spirits.
TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_SEQ_05<tab>O'kalkaya thanks you for improving Captain Rhoswen's mood and ensuring that the Siren's deckswabs were not disposed of prematurely.
TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_TODO_00<tab>/kneel before Rhoswen.
TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_TODO_01<tab>Show Rhoswen that you are /disappointed.
TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_TODO_02<tab>/rally Rhoswen's spirits.
TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_TODO_03<tab>Speak with O'kalkaya.
TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_OKALKAYA_000_0<tab>If yer lookin' fer a place to wet yer whistle, scrag, I'd advise ye to turn tail an' run.

TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_OKALKAYA_000_1<tab>Cap'n Rhoswen's in no mood to be entertainin' customers <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((this eve)) ((this morn')) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((this day)) ((this eve)) /var>)) /var>, an' even when she is, she ain't particularly good at it.
TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_OKALKAYA_000_2<tab>Though...maybe dealin' with a customer's the sort o' shite what might shake 'er from 'er doldrums.

TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_OKALKAYA_000_3<tab>But if ye mean to venture inside the Missin' Member, ye best remember to pay yer proper respects to the cap'n─'less ye ain't afraid o' goin' <var 1A 02 /var>missin'<var 1A 01 /var>. <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Kneelin'<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> afore 'er would be a good start.

TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_RHOSWEN_000_10<tab>The 'ells ye want, drylander!? We're closed! If ye don't want me Sirens to toss ye out on yer arse, show some respect an' <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>kneel<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, scrag!
TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_RHOSWEN_000_11<tab>Oho, so <var 08 E905 ((she)) (('e)) /var> knows <var 08 E905 (('er)) (('is)) /var> place! Good!
TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_RHOSWEN_000_12<tab>If only the Krakens 'ad the same sense o' propriety! Bastards keep seizin' every Garlean ship before we can take a crack at 'em!

TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_RHOSWEN_000_13<tab>'Tis a sorry state of affairs when yer crew's reduced to preyin' on the leavin's o' that mangy bunch o' man-boys. Me younger self would be right <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>disappointed<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> to see 'ow far we've fallen.

TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_RHOSWEN_000_20<tab>Can't ye see I'm wallowin' in self-pity, scrag!? Ye couldn't possibly understand 'ow <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>disappointed<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> I am in meself.
TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_RHOSWEN_000_21<tab>Hmph, so ye do know somethin' o' me pain. But yer sympathy ain't worth more'n a pint o' piss.
TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_RHOSWEN_000_22<tab>It's well an' good we got the Admiral's permission to capture Garlean ships, but what's the use if ye keep on gettin' beat to yer prey!?

TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_RHOSWEN_000_23<tab>We built our reputation reavin' right off the coasts o' Vylbrand, not sailin' a dozen malms into the bleedin' sea. The few imperial dogs found in Lominsan territory get snatched by Krakens 'unting in open waters.

TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_RHOSWEN_000_24<tab>I <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>rallied<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> me crew's spirits when I said we were revivin' the old ways, but after all our struggles, they seem resigned to lettin' those bastards 'ave all the fun...
TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_RHOSWEN_000_30<tab>There's got to be a way to <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>rally<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> me Sirens' spirits again...
TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_RHOSWEN_000_31<tab>Huh? Ye tryin' to make light o' me dilemma? Don't push yer luck, scrag, or I'll gut ye with a hook, like a regular pirate!

TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_RHOSWEN_000_32<tab>Wait─that's it! We're pirates, godsdammit, so we should think like pirates! Bugger keepin' Lominsan waters safe─we'll raid supply shipments to the Garlean outposts along the coasts of Aldenard!

TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_RHOSWEN_000_33<tab>Ahahaha! It's so bleedin' simple, I don't know why I didn't think o' this afore! Thank ye for yer unintended inspiration, scrag. To think I almost 'ad ye fed to the sharks!
TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_OKALKAYA_000_40<tab>I gather yer meetin' with the cap'n went well? I could 'ear 'er cacklin' all the way out 'ere.
TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_OKALKAYA_000_41<tab>Well, whatever ye did, thank ye for doin' it. Last thing we needed was 'er goin' on another rampage, ruinin' deckswabs an' leavin' us with less meat.
TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_OKALKAYA_000_42<tab>'Tain't easy playin' by the Admiral's rules, but if anyone can find a way, Cap'n Rhoswen can!
